summary: Treasury's Fiscal Service issues debt to borrow money for federal operations and reports the debt on financial statements called the Schedules of Federal Debt. As of September 30, 2024, the federal debt was $35.5 trillion—up $2.3 trillion from FY 2023. Interest on the debt in FY 2024 was $1,126.5 billion, an increase of $251.0 billion from FY 2023. We audit and issue opinions annually on...
title: Financial Audit: Bureau of the Fiscal Service's FY 2024 and FY 2023 Schedules of Federal Debt
